name: Pooya Farshim
content: Briefly - Pooya Farshim Pooya FarshimResearch Fellow Follow IO Research Email LinkedIn Google ScholarI am a Research Fellow at Input Output (IOG) and an Associate Professor at the Department of Computer Science, Durham University, where I am a member of the NESTiD and ACiD groups.Before that, I was a lecturer (Assistant Professor) at the University of York and Queen’s University Belfast. I also held postdoctoral research positions at the Crypto Team, École Normale Supérieure (Paris), the Cryptoplexity Group, and TU Darmstadt (Germany).I completed my PhD at the Cryptography and Information Security Group, University of Bristol, and studied Mathematics to Part III at Queens’ College, University of Cambridge.
